filename.value:
@{concat('AMA Distributor Coverage Compliance GPS data','_',
formatDateTime(variables('TimeToday'), 'dd'),formatDateTime(variables('TimeToday'), 'MM'),formatDateTime(variables('TimeToday'), 'yyyy'),'_',item().DistributorName,'.csv')}

activities.name: GetFileList
activities.description: Get the list of file

activities.name: FilterFiles
activities.description: Only files will be selected, the source-folders will not be selected.

activities.name: ForEachFile
activities.description: Iterate each file, and move them one by one.

ifTrueActivities.description: Copy a file from the source store to the destination store.
